installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Lavalink Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

cd /mnt/server

LATEST_VERSION=$(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/lavalink-devs/Lavalink/releases/latest | jq -r '.tag_name')

if [ "${VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_URL="https://github.com/lavalink-devs/Lavalink/releases/download/${LATEST_VERSION}/Lavalink.jar"
else
    DOWNLOAD_URL="https://github.com/lavalink-devs/Lavalink/releases/download/${VERSION}/Lavalink.jar"
fi

echo -e "Downloading Lavalink version ${VERSION}..."
curl -L -o Lavalink.jar ${DOWNLOAD_URL}

if [ ! -f application.yml ]; then
    echo -e "Downloading default application.yml..."
    curl -L -o application.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lavalink-devs/Lavalink/master/LavalinkServer/application.yml.example
fi

echo -e "Installation complete."
